about_the_game:
Gensou Kyosoukyoku GENSOU Skydrift Soundtrack
SOUND HOLIC x StarDrops x AKIYAMA UNI
This is a complete BGM recording of GENSOU Skydrift', composed by a group of gorgeous composers!

In addition, Nana Takahashi's (SOUND HOLIC)
Newly written full version of the OP/ED theme, "SkyDrift" is newly recorded!

This is a collection of Touhou arrangements full of fast-moving sensations that will satisfy both those who have played the game and those who haven't!
